name: Coppélive
storyline:
Frank promised to marry his childhood friend, Hilda. But recently, he's more interested in a virtual YouTuber named Peli!

Will Frank get back together with Hilda or will Coppélive Production's most popular VTuber consume his soul?!
summary:
A modern retelling of the classic tale of Coppélia as a short, linear, erotic visual novel.

Comedy! Romance! Sex! Degeneracy!

Book your seats for the steamy tale of Coppélive!
